content_summary: The presentation discusses the concept of morphogenetic systems and cellular networks in the context of developmental biology. It explores how cells collectively 'know' their function and structure, despite individual cells lacking this knowledge. The speaker also discusses the role of oncogenes in tumor development, specifically how they disconnect cells electrically from the rest of the network, and the potential therapeutic implications of this research.
